title: Consulting Associate, Analytics & Data Science

description:
Rate of Pay: $110,000.00 per year

Duties: Develop or apply mathematical or statistical theory and methods to collect, organize, interpret, and summarize numerical data to provide usable information. Use models to deliver quantitative and qualitative analyses, design and create advanced predictive statistical models. Conduct independent research to identify, collect, manage, and analyze data. Perform large data manipulation using relational databases. Develop analyses and valuation models in the life science industry. Gather data through interview-based research and write internal and external reports. Work on data visualization to present summary and findings. Work closely with project/client manager on business side to perform leadership and ownership on quantitative aspects of strategy consulting projects. Contribute to methodology design in the analytical process and help integrate findings into the broader project work. Contribute to internal studies and initiatives, which improve workplace dynamics and day-to-day project delivery.

Requirements: Employer will accept a Masters degree in Life Sciences, Environment Science Policy, or a related field and two years of experience in the job offered or two years of experience in any occupation in which the required experience was gained.

Experience must include the following:
1) Utilize Programming Language Skills: SQL, SAS, Python, R, STATA, and Pyspark to perform claims data analysis, including patient journey, line of therapy, persistency and compliance analysis, payer and cost analysis.
2) Utilize data visualization tools: PowerBI, Tableau and Qlik to generate dashboards based on claims data and patient chart data.
3) Data Source Exposure: IQVIA LAAD, Komodo, Marketscan, EMR/EHR, and CMS.
4) Statistics and machine learning tools: LASSO, Random Forest, Time Series, Logit, and decision model.
5) Data platform including Databricks, Snowflake and Google Cloud Platform.

Position requires travel. May be assigned to various, unanticipated sites throughout U.S. May telecommute.

Contact Please apply at: Must reference job 21761.149.2.
